title: Two Bedroom/One Bath Apartment Newly Renovated
posting_body: ['Newly renovated, large (795 sq ft), light filled first floor two bedroom apartment with one full bath that runs along the entire south side of the property within a turn of the century (20th) single family home turned six unit apartment building in the fabulous Whittier neighborhood.', 'Completely remodeled in 2021 with updated electrical, heat, plumbing, paint, carpet, flooring, kitchens and bathrooms.', 'Live with historic charm and light along with modern amenities and sustainable LED lighting, electric-hybrid water heaters and modern insulation.', 'Close to transit, bike routes and commerce.', 'Family owned and operated.', 'Tenant pays only electric (metered to each apartment and estimated to be between $25 - 30 per month depending upon use) and internet if desired.', 'Every apartment has been wired to provide US Internet service.', 'We support a safe and respectful building community, so insist upon the following requirements:', 'Renters must have:', 'Demonstrable monthly income at least three times rent;', 'Credit score of at least 675;', 'Good verifiable former landlord references;', "Background check at renter's expense ($50 per applicant);", 'Security Deposit: One months rent', 'Renters insurance.', 'Available April 22, 2022']
